title: Video: Gold & Youth â€“ Time To Kill
content:
Yet another act whom I unintentionally missed at this years Great Escape Festival, Canadian trio Gold & Youth kicked somewhat of a fuss on their brief UK jaunt, and quite rightly so given the strength of Time To Kill.

A track that appeared on the internet a month or two back, Time To Kill is an indie anthem of epic proportions; all floaty, intertwining male/female vocals and booming synth sections. The accompanying video echoes the dark, slightly mysterious feel to the group, shot entirely in black and white and following the tumultuous journey of what one assumes to be a young couple. Check out Time To Kill below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
